ResearchProjectDef.label: Taser Research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Provides the base knowledge in order to create a very basic taser.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pulse Taser
ResearchProjectDef.description: The first firearm based Taser, very slow and ineffective for range.

ResearchProjectDef.label: M26 Taser
ResearchProjectDef.description: A more refined firearm like Taser, more effective range and reloading is quicker that it's predecessor the Pulse Taser.

ResearchProjectDef.label: X26 Taser
ResearchProjectDef.description: The X26 is a more modernised firearm Taser, better range, quicker cooldown and more reliable that it's past models.

ResearchProjectDef.label: X2 Taser
ResearchProjectDef.description: The X2 has extended range, two times the speed for reloading and a higher chance to stun the subject quicker.

ResearchProjectDef.label: X3 Taser
ResearchProjectDef.description: The X3 is the most recent incarnation of the Taser sidearm, it has three times the reloading and shooting speed than it's past models and can shoot from further away.

ResearchProjectDef.label: X12 Taser
ResearchProjectDef.description: The X12 is a shotgun variant of the Taser sidearm. It's shooting is slower than the sidearm variants however it has a wider range and burst fire mode.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Taser Rifle
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Taser Rifle is a assualt rifle variant of the Taser sidearm. It fires like a regular assault rifle, utilizing only electrode powered high velocity rounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Taser Rifle
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Taser Sniper is a long range variant of the taser predecessors. It reloads slower than the shotgun however can fire from a longer distance and has a better chance to hit the subject from further away.
